mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( member_id, order_number, product_name, product_price, quantity, total_amount, point_amount, card_amount, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{orderNumber}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{quantity}, #{totalAmount}, #{pointAmount}, #{cardAmount}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, order_number, product_name, product_price, quantity, total_amount, point_amount, card_amount, status, created_at, updated_at FROM orders WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, member_id, order_number, product_name, product_price, quantity, total_amount, point_amount, card_amount, status, created_at, updated_at FROM orders WHERE order_number = #{orderNumber}

SELECT id, member_id, order_number, product_name, product_price, quantity, total_amount, point_amount, card_amount, status, created_at, updated_at FROM orders WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, member_id, order_number, product_name, product_price, quantity, total_amount, point_amount, card_amount, status, created_at, updated_at FROM orders WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE orders SET point_amount = #{pointAmount}, card_amount = #{cardAmount}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
